jdungeoncrawler

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdungeoncrawler.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ally, Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds reference to live cast (Ally, Enemy, Player) that will interact with the game world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description)
      Entity class constructor.

      Orders Entity to attempt to move to a random neighboring Sector.

      Decrease the temperature of the Sector (if it's not already cold).

      Return the Sector that the Entity is currently in.

      Returns the name of the Sector.

      • react

        public abstract void react(boolean heat,
                           Player player)
        Define reactions for each subclass (Ally, Enemy, Player)
        Parameters:
        heat - True, if the Entity initiated the heating action.
        player - Player object that will be affected.
